summary: A new female khajiit follower to make the game a bit more fun!
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wanted a[i] Immersive[/i] follower in modding? Well you have come to the right place! This adds one new [i]Immersive[/i] follower to Skyrim. She is a female khajiit named Dro'Jhana and has a sad backstory that will/will not make you feel bad for her. This is one of my first mods so please don't be upset. You can also find her in a random tavern/inn. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />                                              [size=6]Enjoy the mod you guys!!![/size]
author: snipeisbest
